name: Forest's Secret
description:
“Forest's Secret” is a CURRENTLY UNRELEASED  cozy, nonviolent adventure game. You play as a traveller who has just arrived at a quiet forest settlement called Wabika, and must explore its mysterious paths, discover its ancient history, and make friends with its quirky inhabitants in order to find what it is you're searching for. There’s lots of neat little stuff to discover!

The game's release date is December 30th, 2018 and will be available to download here on this page. It will be free, and playable on Windows, Mac, and Linux. I hope you'll follow it until then!
